topics.body:

topics.author: 51a2815b7f123be59500049b

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549e8faf6368724fc3190000#post_549e8faf6368724fc3190000
Dude, there is lying and there is telling the truth, and then there's sounding extremely rude.

I understand that this is your belief but keep in mind that others don't have the same belief, and to literally say something of that magnitude is extremely uncalled for and rude.

Do you know how hurt they are right now? Spoilers aren't going to make that any less visible and or traumatizing by the any means. just uncalled for. 

I strongly think you should delete that post cuz that was extremely uncalled for of you to tell someone. And especially about someone's _best friend_.


And like Sideward said, some things are better left unsaid.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

Being truthful is one thing and I admire you for that.
But a friend of mine once said that "You should always speak the truth but you must always know when."
